name: NextArena
description:
Play In An Arena Where You Fight A Horde Of Incoming Nextbots Made Directly From Random Image Files On Your Computer And See How Long You Can Survive And How Much Can You Kill!

You Also Have An Image Gallery To See Which Image's Nextbots Have You Managed To Kill And How Much Of Each One!

Theres Nothing Else For Me To Say About This One. Just Download The Game And Give Me My Meaningless Internet Numbers.

Textures From: https://ambientcg.com/

Skybox From: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/free-hdr-sky-612...

Source Code: https://github.com/GuyMakesStuff/Random-Computer-Image-Nextbots
